mapper.select: select FLOOR((2016-TO_CHAR(c.cst_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY'))/10)||'0' as age,count(*) customerNum from enterprise e, reservation r, customer c where e.etp_address like '%강서구%' and e.etp_superclass = '마사지' and e.etp_num = r.etp_num and e.etp_email = r.etp_email and r.cst_email = c.cst_email group by FLOOR((2016-TO_CHAR(c.cst_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY'))/10) order by age
